title: How to Make a Toasted Marshmallow Milkshake

steps.headline: Spear the marshmallows onto a skewer.
steps.description: Use more than one skewer or do in rounds if there isn't enough room to leave adequate hand hold at one end.

steps.headline: Hold over a gas flame and toast.
steps.description: Expect a little burning, it's what happens when you toast food like this and adds to the flavor. For safety's sake, hold the skewer with an oven mitt to protect your hands from heat. If you can't toast this way, place the marshmallows on a baking sheet and broil (grill with heat topside down).

steps.headline: Set aside to cool slightly.
steps.description: Place on a saucer or similar.

steps.headline: Pour the milk and vanilla extract into the blender.
steps.description: Add the scoops of vanilla ice cream and all but 2 of the toasted marshmallows.

steps.headline: Blend to mix.
steps.description: Blend until it looks reasonably smooth. This can take up to 5 minutes.

steps.headline: Pour into a tall glass suitable for a milkshake.
steps.description: Top with the spare roasted marshmallows.

steps.headline: Enjoy your liquidized creamy toasted marshmallows.

text: Toasting the Marshmallows Spear the marshmallows onto a skewer. Use more than one skewer or do in rounds if there isn't enough room to leave adequate hand hold at one end. Hold over a gas flame and toast. Expect a little burning, it's what happens when you toast food like this and adds to the flavor. For safety's sake, hold the skewer with an oven mitt to protect your hands from heat. If you can't toast this way, place the marshmallows on a baking sheet and broil (grill with heat topside down). Set aside to cool slightly. Place on a saucer or similar. Making the Milkshake Pour the milk and vanilla extract into the blender. Add the scoops of vanilla ice cream and all but 2 of the toasted marshmallows. Blend to mix. Blend until it looks reasonably smooth. This can take up to 5 minutes. Pour into a tall glass suitable for a milkshake. Top with the spare roasted marshmallows. Enjoy your liquidized creamy toasted marshmallows.
